class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        A = sorted(horizontalCut)
        B = sorted(verticalCut)
        res = 0
        while A or B:
            a = A[-1] if A else -math.inf
            multi_A = n-len(B)
            b = B[-1] if B else -math.inf
            multi_B = m-len(A)
            if a>b:
                A.pop()
                res += a*multi_A
            else:
                B.pop()
                res += b*multi_B
        return res
